languages.text: "Что в убежище делают все эти блюстители и воины? Почему они не на улицах, не дают отпор врагам Человечества?"

traits.locale_text: "Наконец мы здесь. Штаб выглядит достаточно безопасным — можно перевести дух".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "What are all these enforcers and soldiers doing in this shelter? Why are they not on the streets, fighting back against the enemies of Humanity?"
languages.original_text: "Что в убежище делают все эти блюстители и воины? Почему они не на улицах, не дают отпор врагам Человечества?"

traits.locale_text: "What are all these enforcers and soldiers doing in this shelter? Why are they not on the streets, fighting back against the enemies of Humanity?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What are all these enforcers and soldiers doing in this shelter? Why are they not on the streets, fighting back against the enemies of Humanity?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What are all these enforcers and soldiers doing in this shelter? Why are they not on the streets, fighting back against the enemies of Humanity?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "What are all these enforcers and soldiers doing in this shelter? Why are they not on the streets, fighting back against the enemies of Humanity?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “这群执法者和士兵都在这个庇护所里干什么呢？他们为什么没有驻扎在街道上，对人类之敌展开反击？”
languages.original_text: "What are all these enforcers and soldiers doing in this shelter? Why are they not on the streets, fighting back against the enemies of Humanity?"

traits.locale_text: “这群镇压者和士兵都在这个庇护所里干什么呢？他们为什么没有驻扎在街道上，对人类之敌展开反击？”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «¿Qué hacen todos estos guardias y soldados en el refugio? ¿Por qué no están en las calles, combatiendo a los enemigos de la Humanidad?».
languages.original_text: "What are all these enforcers and soldiers doing in this shelter? Why are they not on the streets, fighting back against the enemies of Humanity?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué hacen todos estos guardias y soldados en el refugio? ¿Por qué no están en las calles, combatiendo a los enemigos de la Humanidad?».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「執行官や兵士たちは、このシェルターで何をしていたというの？なぜ彼らは町にでて、人類の敵に反撃しない？」
languages.original_text: "What are all these enforcers and soldiers doing in this shelter? Why are they not on the streets, fighting back against the enemies of Humanity?"

traits.locale_text: 「執行官や兵士たちは、このシェルターで何をしていたというの？なぜ彼らは町にでて、人類の敵に反撃しない？」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Was machen all diese Enforcer und Soldaten in dieser Zuflucht? Warum sind sie nicht auf den Straßen und schlagen die Feinde der Menschheit zurück?"
languages.original_text: "What are all these enforcers and soldiers doing in this shelter? Why are they not on the streets, fighting back against the enemies of Humanity?"

traits.locale_text: "Was machen all diese Enforcer und Soldaten in dieser Zuflucht? Warum sind sie nicht auf den Straßen und schlagen die Feinde der Menschheit zurück?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Que font tous ces soldats et ces prévôts dans cet abri ? Pourquoi ne sont-ils pas dans les rues à combattre les ennemis de l'humanité ? »
languages.original_text: "What are all these enforcers and soldiers doing in this shelter? Why are they not on the streets, fighting back against the enemies of Humanity?"

traits.locale_text: « Que font tous ces soldats et ces prévôts dans cet abri ? Pourquoi ne sont-ils pas dans les rues à combattre les ennemis de l'humanité ? »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Bunca infazcı ve askerin sığınakta ne işi var? Neden sokaklara çıkıp İnsanlığın düşmanlarına karşı savaşmıyorlar?"
languages.original_text: "What are all these enforcers and soldiers doing in this shelter? Why are they not on the streets, fighting back against the enemies of Humanity?"

traits.locale_text: "Bunca infazcı ve askerin sığınakta ne işi var? Neden sokaklara çıkıp İnsanlığın düşmanlarına karşı savaşmıyorlar?
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
